::Magmatron/Bobertron::

    He needed to find Bobertron, but that wouldn't be hard, because Bobertron 
was bound to him through mind. Magmatron walked to the Command room.
    Entering he saw Bobertron in his chair. He turned to see who was entering.
    "Who disturbs me?" Bobertron asked. 
    "The Judge," Magmatron said turning Bobertron in his chair. Bobertron's 
optics went wide with fear.
    "Who, what are you? How did you get in here?" Bobertron asked.
    "I am the one who put you in power around here. I am Magmatron, Emperor 
of Destruction." He said in reliance.
    "That's impossible, Magmatron was a fuzor, not whatever you are." 
Bobertron said.
    "I have been changed by my master," Magmatron said. "Now do we have to 
have a trial for what you have done?" He said as his face changed from that 
of Magmatron's to that of the Judge's.(Transformers: The Movie the guy with 
the 5 faces, he became Magmatron)
    "N-nn-no. I will give you back your base, it's all yours," Bobertron 
said, he had read the history logs pertaining to the Judge.
    "Give me back my base? Do you really think you ever controlled it?" 
Magmatron said. "Accessing the computer was smart, but it allowed me to get 
into your mind. You are now bound to me as deeply as any Quintession." 
(reference to StarCraft's Overmind)
